titleStmt.title: From one who was moved of the Lord God to go a sign among the priests & professors of the prophets, apostles, and Christs words but dead from their life, and naked from salvation and immortality ... : and so this is to you spiritual Aegyptians and black Aethiopians ... / William Sympson.
titleStmt.author: Simpson, William, 1627?-1671.
